data.title: Literature / Fiction / Poetry
data.meta_description: Schroeder's Book Haven offers a selection of books, pamphlets and ephemera on literature, literary figures, modern firsts, first editions, limited editions, signed & autographed editions, science fiction and much more.
data.text:
If your email program does not support the ?subject= command, then you might have to edit the To: address to delete any characters after the .com.

To increase or decrease the size of the text, use your browser's View - Text Size command.

We are usually by the phone

Tuesday - Friday: 10-6 pm,

Saturday: 10-4 pm Central Time>

Closed Sunday & Monday.

281-332-5226

Thanks, Bert Schroeder
